I had the pleasure of working with Jaime for two and a half years while she was in the Loan Originations and Asset Management divisions within the company. As an Analyst in the Loan Originations group, Jaime underwrote, managed the due diligence and closing of $110 million of new loans for the company.  I worked directly with Jaime on several of these deals, and was impressed with her attention to detail and the organization of her work. As a Senior Analyst in the Asset Management group, Jaime worked on my team on 18 assets in a portfolio of 46 investments.  She showed she could successfully manage and prioritize several projects at one time.  Jaime and I worked directly together during her entire time in the Asset Management division, where she demonstrated her work ethic and her willingness to take on any and all tasks at hand.
